question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. brown hat
B. white hat
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The person wearing the brown hat is seated on the zebra, which is positioned further back in the scene relative to the person in the white hat who is closer to the foreground.
